card-1: Sedans Choose a sedan for its affordability and excellent fuel economy. Ideal for cruising in the city  or on your next road trip.
card-2: SUVs Take an SUV for its spacious interior, power, and versatility. Perfect for your next family vacation and off-road adventures.
card-3: Luxury Cruise in the best car brands without the bloated prices. Enjoy the enhanced comfort of a luxury rental and arrive in style.
